attributes.action: W. H.O. to close borders of Ebola infected countries and to provide clear effective protocols for those non nationals returning to their own countries
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to petition the W.H.O. to close the borders of all Ebola infected countries for nationals of those countries to prevent their travel to the rest of the world.
I would further like the government to petition the W.H.O. to provide clear quarantine guidelines not only for those leaving infected countries but also for those treating patients who have subsequently developed Ebola.
